name: Gummy Worms Link Pro - Draw Sweet & Delicious Color Line
name_original: Gummy Worms Link Pro - Draw Sweet & Delicious Color Line
description:
WARNING - INSANELY ADDICTIVE & CHALLENGING!

Enjoy a deliciously yummy experience while you play the best puzzle game on the app store! Download Gummy Worms Flow Line Pro today and play the game you have been searching for.

How to Play Gummy Worms Flow Line Pro:

There are loads of levels, some more challenging than others. You must take these cute gummy worms and connect them to the candy of the same color. Connect all of the gummy worms and fill the board as much as possible. You will have a specific number of moves, the less moves you make the higher your score will be! Earn a perfect store by using the least number of moves and fill all the squares on the board. If you get stuck, don’t worry, you can get help with a hint. The most important step of all, have FUN!

Features:

-Over 3,450 challenging levels.
-Time Challenges
-Boards ranging simple to insane!
-Race the clock or focus on covering the board.
-Earn bonuses through Achievements
-Great graphics for you eye pleasing enjoyment.
-Hours of endless fun.
-Customize your experience by selecting packs that are as challenging or easy as you like!

If you want to play a challenging puzzle game, look no further. Enjoy the brilliant graphics and animations, while challenging your mind. Levels range from relaxed to mind-bending
